31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:If anyone emancipates his share in a slave, he should emancipate him completely if he has enough money to pay the full price ; but if he has none, he will be emancipated to the extent of his share

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ رَوَى أَنَّهُ، لاَ يَسْتَسْعِي
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Whoever Reported That He Is Not Asked To Work
